name: redis-streams-broker
description: This package is a broker to redis stream data type, This package provides guaranteed message delivery feature with acknowledgement.

scripts.test: npm run redisstart && npm run mocha && npm run redisstop
scripts.redisstop: docker ps -q --filter name=streamz | xargs docker stop
scripts.redisstart: npm run redisstop && docker run --name streamz -p 6379:6379 -itd --rm redis:latest

author: Laukik
